p: The rescue plasmids for the internal segments of the PR8 backbone, including pDZ-PR8/PB2, -PR8/PB1, pDZ-PR8/PA, -PR8/NP, -PR8/M, -PR8/NS, and -PR8/NS-Gluc were used as previously described [ 28]. The rescue plasmids of A/Wyoming/3/03 (NY, H3N2), including pDZ-NY/PB2, -NY/PB1, -NY/PA, -NY/HA, -NY/NP, -NY/NA, -NY/M, and -NY/NS were kindly provided by Adolfo Garcia-Sastre (Mt Sinai School of Medicine, New York, NY, USA).
